Package dataAccess

Class GameDAO

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.GameDAO
public class GameDAO extends Object
DAO class for handling game-related data operations.

    • findGameById

      public Game findGameById(String gameID) throws DataAccessException
      Retrieves a specified game from the data store by gameID.
      Parameters:
      gameID - The ID of the game to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The retrieved game object.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if the operation fails.

    • findAllGames

      public List<Game> findAllGames() throws DataAccessException
      Retrieves all games from the data store.
      Returns:
      A list of all game objects.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if the operation fails.

    • claimSpot

      public void claimSpot(String gameID, String username, chess.ChessGame.TeamColor color) throws DataAccessException
      Claims a spot in a specified game.
      Parameters:
      gameID - The game ID of the spot to be claimed.
      username - The username of the player claiming the spot.
      color - The color (WHITE/BLACK) the player wants.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if the operation fails.

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame(String gameID, chess.ChessGame newChessGame) throws DataAccessException
      Updates the chess game in the data store.
      Parameters:
      gameID - The ID of the game to be updated.
      newChessGame - The new ChessGame object to replace the existing one.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if the operation fails.

    • removeGame

      public void removeGame(String gameID) throws DataAccessException
      Removes a game from the data store.
      Parameters:
      gameID - The ID of the game to be removed.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - if the operation fails.

      public void clearAll() throws DataAccessException
